#summary Javascript Webpage speed improvements.

= Introduction =

The following are some tools I've recently used to help improve the load times of our mapping pages. These are based mainly on a soup of Openlayers, GeoExt/ExtJS. 

= Javascript Minimizer =
One enhancement I'd read about was that it is better to ask the server for one larger file, than multiple smaller files. 
I used the [http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/compressor/ yuicompressor] from Yahoo to compress multiple javascript and css files. 
To concatenate and compress the files in one pass, I used this [http://lowfatcats.com/blog/1-tutorial/18-how-to-optimize-javascript-css-linux-using-yui-compressor.html script].
